chinese: m.垃圾，废物
english: rubbish

chinese: 请把你的垃圾都放在这个袋子里。
english: Please put your rubbish in the bag

chinese: n行话，术语
english: jargon

chinese: 我不懂他所说的关于马和骑马的行话。
english: I didn't understand all the horse and riding jargon he was using

chinese: adi 费时费力的，辛苦的
english: laborious

chinese: 这个女孩花费了大量的时间来为考试做准备。
english: The young girl spent many laborious hours studying for the test

chinese: n. 起诉
english: indictment

chinese: 她起诉了那家卖给她过期奶粉的公司。
english: She made an indictment against the company who sold her expired milk powder

chinese: 警告，告诫
english: warn

chinese: 这个标牌警告骨头有被吃掉的危险。
english: The sign warned the bone about the danger of being eaten

chinese: cd司法的，审判（上）的
english: judicial

chinese: 法官、陪审团和证人在司法系统中很重要。
english: The judge, jury and witnesses are important participants in the judicial system

chinese: n（物理）动量；势头；动力
english: momentum

chinese: 动量让他高高跃起。
english: His momentum caused him to go up into the air

chinese: ad，轻快的；活跃的；寒冷而清新的
english: brisk

chinese: 他们年轻健康，在跑步训练中保持着轻快的步
english: They were young and fit, and kept up a brisk pace on their training runs

chinese: n，钢，钢铁，钢制品以下决心应对（不愉快的事）adl.钢的，与钢有关的
english: steel

chinese: 在建造房屋时，钢铁可以用于加固混凝土。
english: Steel can be used to reinforce concrete in the construction of buildings

chinese: v.提升，晋升；促进；发扬；促销
english: promote

chinese: 她工作表现很棒，所以她的老板让她升职了。
english: She was very good at her job, so her boss promoted her to a higher position

chinese: n.直觉；感觉
english: intuition

chinese: 她凭直觉意识到有什么不对劲。
english: Her intuition told her that something was wrong

chinese: ad）.脆弱的；易受伤的；易受攻击的
english: vulnerable

chinese: 因为是回形针串的，所以这条链子看起来很脆
english: The chain looks very vulnerable because of the paper clip

chinese: 以呼吁，请求；申诉；有吸引力 n.呼吁；恳求；（为慈善或好的事业所做的）筹款努力；（人或物的）吸引力
english: appeal

chinese: 动物权益保护组织呼吁停止商业捕鲸。
english: The animal rights group launched an appeal to stop commercial whaling

chinese: adj，健壮的，强壮的；精力充沛的
english: robust

chinese: 喝牛奶能帮你强身健体。
english: Drinking milk helps you build a robust body

chinese: 赞助；做…⋯的保人 』赞助人
english: sponsor

chinese: 这个电视节目由多家企业赞助。
english: This TV program is sponsored by a number of companies

chinese: cd）.迷人的，富有魅力的
english: glamorous

chinese: 她太迷入了，每个人都在抽她！
english: She's so glamorous, Everyone is taking photos of her
